mean_en: an extra amount of money that is added to a payment, especially to somebody’s wages or salary as a reward; anything pleasant that is extra and more or better than you were expecting
sentence: My boss gave me a bonus this month for doing extra work.
sentence_trans: 我的老板这个月给我发了奖金，因为我做了额外的工作。
word_etyma: bon好 + us用 → 用好的东西进行奖励 → 奖金，红利
